titles.title: The Whole Earth Is Filled With His Glory

properties.copyright: 1992 Maranatha Praise, Inc., Administered by Music Services

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Holy holy holy holy
Holy is the Lord
Holy holy holy holy
Holy is the Lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I see the Lord
Seated on the throne exalted
And the train of His robe
Fills the temple with glory
And the whole earth is filled
And the whole earth is filled
And the whole earth is filled
With His glory
